name: Haunted Dungeons (EdgarRdzG09)
description:
Haunted Dungeons is a difficult platform game where you can have a good time trying to complete it, do you think you can escape from the Haunted Dungeons?

Features:
- 20 levels
- Many enemies
- 2 bosses
- Achievements and more.

Controls:

[space] - Jump

[a] or [<] (left arrow) - Move to the left

[d] or [>] (right arrow) - Move to the right

[f] - Attack

[Esc] - Pause
